titleStmt.title: Of the necessity of reformation in, and before Luther's time and what (visibly) hath most hindred the progress of it : occasioned by some late virulent books written by Papists, but especially, by that intituled, Labyrinthus Cantuariensis : here besides some other points, the grand business of these times, infallibility, is fully discussed / by Meric Casaubon ...
titleStmt.author: Casaubon, Meric, 1599-1671.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by A. Maxwel for Timothy Garthwait ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
